Detailed Description

RouteReq that can be translated from isabBox-format.

uint16  startAngle
)  [inline]
 

Set route data explicitly.

Parameters:
origLat The latitude of the origin.
origLon The longitude of the origin.
destLat The latitude of the destination.
destLon The longitude of the destination.
startAngle The starting angle at the origin. Counting clockwise and using 360 degrees per complete circle.

uint32  navID,
uint32  userID,
const char *  userName
)  [inline]
 

Set RouteReq header data.

Parameters:
protoVer The protocol version.
navID Used if protoVer is greater than 0.
userID Used if protoVer is 1.
userName Used if protoVer is greater than 1. Must be a 20 char long string, including terminating NULL byte.
